The machine at the base of the pillar is in bad shape - the adra panels are warped and the copper is corroded, but it looks whole.

A high, keening sound comes from the adra.

You turn the adra wheel and adjust some of the sliders.

At first, nothing happens.

Then, you feel a fluctuation in the ether. The wailing grows louder.

You check the copper connections and knobs. Everything appears to be intact, but none of the essence in the pillar runs through it.

The keening grows louder.

Essence moves within the adra, opening a dimension as raw and distorted as a fresh wound.

Something in that place pulls at your soul, and the distant voices cry out again.
The dimension within the adra is open, tugging at your soul.
